mapper.select: select arrival_detail_id, arrival_id, accessories_id, test_wether, material_type, order_number, line_number, arrival_num, conversion_rate, price_with_tax, price_without_tax from accessories_arrival_detail where arrival_detail_id = #{arrivalDetailId}
mapper.insert: insert into accessories_arrival_detail(arrival_id, accessories_id, test_wether, material_type, order_number, line_number, arrival_num, conversion_rate, price_with_tax, price_without_tax) values (#{arrivalId}, #{accessoriesId}, #{testWether}, #{materialType}, #{orderNumber}, #{lineNumber}, #{arrivalNum}, #{conversionRate}, #{priceWithTax}, #{priceWithoutTax})

insert into accessories_arrival_detail(arrival_id, accessories_id, test_wether, material_type, order_number, line_number, arrival_num, conversion_rate, price_with_tax, price_without_tax) values
(#{entity.arrivalId}, #{entity.accessoriesId}, #{entity.testWether}, #{entity.materialType}, #{entity.orderNumber}, #{entity.lineNumber}, #{entity.arrivalNum}, #{entity.conversionRate}, #{entity.priceWithTax}, #{entity.priceWithoutTax})

insert into accessories_arrival_detail(arrival_id, accessories_id, test_wether, material_type, order_number, line_number, arrival_num, conversion_rate, price_with_tax, price_without_tax) values
(#{entity.arrivalId}, #{entity.accessoriesId}, #{entity.testWether}, #{entity.materialType}, #{entity.orderNumber}, #{entity.lineNumber}, #{entity.arrivalNum}, #{entity.conversionRate}, #{entity.priceWithTax}, #{entity.priceWithoutTax})
on duplicate key update arrival_id = values(arrival_id), accessories_id = values(accessories_id), test_wether = values(test_wether), material_type = values(material_type), order_number = values(order_number), line_number = values(line_number), arrival_num = values(arrival_num), conversion_rate = values(conversion_rate), price_with_tax = values(price_with_tax), price_without_tax = values(price_without_tax)
mapper.update:
update accessories_arrival_detail
arrival_id = #{arrivalId},
accessories_id = #{accessoriesId},
test_wether = #{testWether},
material_type = #{materialType},
order_number = #{orderNumber},
line_number = #{lineNumber},
arrival_num = #{arrivalNum},
conversion_rate = #{conversionRate},
price_with_tax = #{priceWithTax},
price_without_tax = #{priceWithoutTax},
where arrival_detail_id = #{arrivalDetailId}
